definition: to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Asiatic buffalo often domesticated for use as a draft animal.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲水牛，常蓄养作驮用。

definition: to keep (an animal)/to look after the needs of (a person or an animal)/(fig.) to keep (a spy, lackey etc) in one's pay
to put to work (servant or animal)/to make use of for labor
to accumulate/to gather/to amass wealth by heavy taxation or other unscrupulous means/(science) convergent
to gather (people)/to collect (talent)/to come to an end
not to do anything productive/to idle away one's time
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to serve as/to be a substitute for
person willing to sacrifice his life (for a good cause)
